OrgName.entry: SOUTH EAST SHEFFIELD OLDER PEOPLES HOUSING SUPPORT SCHEME

Desc.entry: A registered charity delivered by Age Concern under contract to Sheffield City Council as part of the government's "Supporting People" initiative. A team of trained support planners and support workers provide housing related support to older people living in the South East area of the city. A programme of support is agreed by the client and the Support Planner which can include help to find and move to suitable accommodation, access benefits, budget, manage debts, develop lifeskills, prevent isolation and find appropriate services to meet clients' needs. Self or any referral
